products.title: March Hares Country Roman Blind
products.description: Hop to it. Leaping into your home, this roman blind has tasteful trend, country chic and retro twee written all over it. The watercoloured colourway in softest greens, brown and neutrals is gentle on the eye but with so much lovely patterning too, including hopping hares and f hop to it.

products.title: Country Blossom Linen Ashen Gold Roman Blind
products.description: Layered from a collection of clean, crisp and on-trend shades for a stylish and contemporary effect, the addition of golden highlights bring the fabric suddenly to life and add a bright, summery touch. products.title: Emin Country Grey Roman Blind
products.description: The beautifully woven emin country grey roman blind will look the part in your home, oozing both grace and glamour. The soft, neutral grey shade has a cosy feel, while still being stylish and sophisticated too. The delicate colour means the roman blind is a versatile delight the beautifully woven emin country grey roman blind will look the part in your home, oozing both grace and glamour.

products.title: Country Hares Duck Egg
products.description: Min width: 350mm max width: 1340mm (with join 2500mm) min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 100% cotton guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro. Buy made to measure country hares duck egg deluxe roman blinds from soeasy blinds.
